title: Laura Dern oozes old Hollywood glamour in low-cut white dress and red lip, named Woman Of The Year
text:
She is a veteran actress with nearly 90 credits to her name in her over 45-year career.

So it comes as no surprise that Laura Dern oozed of old Hollywood glamour on her latest magazine cover.

The 52-year-old actress channeled her inner Marilyn Monroe as she was featured on the front of the November issue of Town & Country magazine in which she was named the Woman Of The Year.

Simply stunning: Laura Dern channeled her inner Marilyn Monroe as she was featured on the front of the November issue of Town & Country magazine

Laura looked absolutely stunning in a low-cut white dress as she ramped up the glitz with a swipe of bright red lipstick.

She had a black velvet blazer draped over her shoulders as she posed laying across an emerald chair.

The actress continued channeling the legendary Some Like It Hot actress as her blonde locks were worn down into waves.

Well deserved: The 52-year-old actress was honored with Woman Of The Year by the monthly publication

Pretty: The actress continued channeling the legendary Some Like It Hot actress as her blonde locks were worn down into waves

Dern has made waves in recent years over her role as Renata Klein in Big Little Lies - which earned her both an Emmy Award and Golden Globe in 2017 - who famously exclaimed 'I will not not be rich!' on the latest season.

In the accompanying article, the actress told a hilarious story about how her boisterous and dramatic character made for a bit of an embarrassing moment for her 17-year-old son Ellery while away on a summer program.

She said that one day at lunch, the teenager's cohorts were talking about the HBO series and he chose to keep quiet until he was asked about the show directly.

Powerhouse: Dern has made waves in recent years over her role as Renata Klein in Big Little Lies - which earned her both an Emmy Award and Golden Globe in 2017 - which made for an awkward moment for her 17-year-old son Ellery

Pride and joy: Dern pictured with her son Ellery and daughter Jaya, now 14, at LAX in 2017

The way they were: Dern and Ben Harper, pictured in 2009, were married from 2005 to 2013

The kids began to ask if he hated it because he seemed avoidant to which he confessed: 'It’s not that. It’s just…my mom is Renata Klein.'

Laura said that the rest of the group thought Ellery may have been speaking metaphorically but the teenager insisted that the actress was actually his mother.

The Jurassic Park star said with a laugh: 'I love that he didn’t say Laura Dern. He said his mom was Renata!

'I was like, "That this happened to you around that character, of all characters." Poor thing.'

Simply stunning: Laura looked gorgeous in a $6, 825 Versace dress featuring crystals all over it

Aside from Ellerly, Dern also shares a 14-year-old daughter named Jaya with ex-husband and musician Ben Harper. They were married from 2005 to 2013.

All eyes on her: Laura is featured on the front of the November issue

Harper is an accomplished singer whose work includes the songs Both Sides Of The Gun, Lifeline, and What Lies For Dark Times.

A critically acclaimed musician, Harper has received three Grammy awards throughout his career, most recently in 2014 for Best Blues Album.

In addition to Ellery and Jaya, Harper has son Charles and daughter Harris from his first marriage to Joanna Harper.

He remarried in 2015 to Jaclyn Matfus.

Dern has not remarried but has continued to rise to prominence with her starring role in Big Little Lies.

Her co-star Reese Witherspoon gushed to Town & Country about the fellow actress as she recalled a scene where she was left mystified by Laura's performance.

The 43-year-old actress said: 'I got to see every extraordinary faculty that Laura has in her toolbox. She came in crying, told a joke, had us all laughing, became hysterical, cried again, and then had a dramatic, comedic exit.

'Just watching her do that scene was like a year of acting classes.'

Aside from Big Little Lies, she will also reprise her role as Ellie Sattler in Jurassic World 3.

The action film is slated for a 2021 release.
